topic.title: Programming books
topic.body: Some time ago, I saw a repository of programming books someone posted. Can anyone link it please?

topic.title: Help creating new hub for ZeroGallery?
topic.body: I cloned a ZeroGallery hub hoping to create my own galleries. When I try adding images, the process takes soooooo long and never finishes. I can see the images in the gallery photo, but no content.json is created in the actual gallery folder. Does anyone have any guidance?

1583777872_1Jgu3kQaBojGnFj82E6Gd3tsyAsKC.body:
Don't answer the phone unless you know who is calling

Anyone or anything actually important will call back or leave a message

1572121659_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
> [almostsoul](#comment_35_1G9tYawBzteEiLGTqghKrJ96tjm4eTuv6m): Culture is genetic. 

You are a fucking idiot. There are arguments to be made in the nature vs. nurture debate but this is a smooth-brained take. The cultural aspects you aspire to are formed over the course of your life. You mean to tell me that a white European newborn raised by a Nigerian or Japanese family won't adopt the culture of their parents?

1595175984_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2.body: I've used it, but never got anywhere

1597255787_1NH142U7sEqKGnZXg5VUFp5SPtSjd.body: Thanks for the help ansho! I did some debugging, there's definitely some issue with mangoGallery+. I tracked down GalleryHub+ yesterday and that works perfectly fine.

1597273154_1DnpB2yFpVwyhA29h2rRsifGVEC1s.body: I'd be down to play some Civ passing a save file around

1596775198_1KjezDT16Z47VxZasHVX4LLTb91h9.body:
> [0mega](#comment_3_192xAupujZXB6jpoWqpwobPnEdQovAKiXc): shove god up your ass, along with all the other magic made up fairies. Don't be a cunt, wear a fucking mask

The only reasonable take

> [brianhanson2nd](#comment_64_1N8yx3zC1YKuam31pUi9eQUruBCEF9u3eE): Face masks do more harm then good.

What harm is done by wearing a piece of paper or cloth over your face?

1598587925_1JF4wvtFwYMrD4uhzLeNwW6SMVS4r.body:
> [bigbadbob](#comment_1137_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): Seem kinda fuct up that people have to protest things such as child trafficking.   It's like a big group of people stating the obvious.

Now image how BLM protestors feel. Or those demanding action against climate change. What is obvious is that people will ignore any problem for as long as they can.

1600281891_13sQUup3LrR7Y6E7eXxGLZzMVkvK2.body: This movie is such pedobait, I love it. At least, I'd pretend to love it if it weren't so comically horrible. This movie makes less sense than The Room!

> [zeronetuser101](#comment_1_1JvFhgnYTD257iRnVk6JpzDgbkZjRKJYkD): Nobody made this whole mess with Stanley Kubrick though

Kubrick watered down Lolita from the book, and both book and movie had the same end message: this pedo shit ain't it. Cuties has no message

> [reichama](#comment_30_19M1Unu2z3j9WyiQ1vcgG6yGnPRmTkUkVe): Now we're just on a roadmap towards total destruction. Just like Rome was. Next up, the new dark ages.

Quit being such a fuckin doomer and take control of your life.
